Pokemon type to personality mapping: 
      bug: careful
      electric: hardy
      fairy: impish naughty sassy
      fighting: adamant calm careful lax lonely relaxed serious
      fire: bold brave brave gentle hardy impish impish lax mild modest naive naughty quiet rash rash timid
      flying: hasty impish serious
      grass: adamant bashful bold calm docile gentle lonely naive quiet quiet sassy
      ground: bashful gentle hardy quiet
      normal: brave brave jolly mild naughty quiet
      rock: bashful docile impish mild naughty
      water: bashful bold docile hardy hardy impish impish jolly naughty
